text: The system shall allow users to transfer funds between accounts in real time
The system shall send an SMS confirmation after each successful transfer
The system shall support transfers up to $10,000 per transaction
The system shall support unlimited transaction amounts for verified business users
The system shall automatically log users out after 5 minutes of inactivity
The system shall maintain user sessions for up to 15 minutes for convenience
The system shall use AES-256 encryption for all stored financial data
The system shall comply with PCI-DSS security standards
The system shall display a summary of recent transactions on the dashboard
The system shall require two-factor authentication before any transaction above $1,000
